mapper.select: SELECT E.EQID as equipment_id, E.EQNAME as equipment_name, E.EQDESC as equipment_description, E.EQHANDLERCLASS as equipment_handlerclass, E.EQSTATE_TAGID as equipment_statetagid, E.EQALIVE_TAGID as equipment_alivetagid, E.EQALIVEINTERVAL as equipment_aliveinterval, E.EQCOMMFAULT_TAGID as equipment_commfaulttagid, E.EQ_PARENT_ID as equipment_parentid, E.EQSTATE as equipment_state, E.EQSTATUSTIME AS equipment_status_time, E.EQSTATUSDESC AS equipment_status_desc, D.TAGID as datatag_id FROM EQUIPMENT E LEFT OUTER JOIN DATATAG D ON (E.EQID = D.TAG_EQID AND D.TAGRULE IS NULL AND D.TAGCONTROLTAG = 0) WHERE E.EQ_PROCID IS NULL

SELECT E.EQID as equipment_id, E.EQNAME as equipment_name, E.EQDESC as equipment_description, E.EQHANDLERCLASS as equipment_handlerclass, E.EQSTATE_TAGID as equipment_statetagid, E.EQALIVE_TAGID as equipment_alivetagid, E.EQALIVEINTERVAL as equipment_aliveinterval, E.EQCOMMFAULT_TAGID as equipment_commfaulttagid, E.EQ_PARENT_ID as equipment_parentid, E.EQSTATE as equipment_state, E.EQSTATUSTIME AS equipment_status_time, E.EQSTATUSDESC AS equipment_status_desc, D.TAGID as datatag_id FROM EQUIPMENT E LEFT OUTER JOIN DATATAG D ON (E.EQID = D.TAG_EQID AND D.TAGRULE IS NULL AND D.TAGCONTROLTAG = 0) WHERE E.EQ_PROCID IS NULL AND E.EQID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO equipment(EQID, EQNAME, EQDESC, EQHANDLERCLASS, EQSTATE_TAGID, EQALIVE_TAGID, EQALIVEINTERVAL, EQCOMMFAULT_TAGID, EQ_PARENT_ID, EQSTATE, EQSTATUSTIME, EQSTATUSDESC) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{handlerClassName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stateTagId}, #{aliveTagId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{aliveInterval}, #{commFaultTagId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{parentId}, #{supervisionStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: UPDATE EQUIPMENT SET EQNAME = #{name}, EQDESC = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EQSTATE_TAGID = #{stateTagId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, EQALIVE_TAGID = #{aliveTagId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, EQALIVEINTERVAL = #{aliveInterval,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, EQCOMMFAULT_TAGID = #{commFaultTagId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, EQ_PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} WHERE EQID = #{id}
